alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LOGAN COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dunmor to 7 miles south of Fort Campbell North. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Anderson, Auburn, Adairville, Lewisburg, Justice, Insco, Gordonsville, Spa and Epleys. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Kentucky.
